meanings.definition: A person who drinks alcohol excessively.
meanings.sent1: The rummies at the bar were laughing loudly.
meanings.sent2: Last night, the rummies were causing a ruckus in the street.
meanings.sent3: The rummies tried to dance on the tables but failed hilariously.
meanings.sent4: The rummies stumbled around like lost sailors in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The image of the rummies swaying with their drinks will stay with me.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are drunk or intoxicated.
meanings.sent1: The rummies in the corner were singing off-key.
meanings.sent2: After the party, the rummies stumbled out into the night.
meanings.sent3: The rummies thought they were secret agents on a mission.
meanings.sent4: The rummies huddled together like lost sheep in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the rummies giggling uncontrollably was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A slang term for alcoholic beverages.
meanings.sent1: The bartender served up some cold rummies to the customers.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone was enjoying their rummies.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was filled with sandwiches and rummies.
meanings.sent4: The bottles of rummies lined the shelves like soldiers in formation.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the rummies filled the room with a sweet scent.
